Articles.Content:
It existed a website where we could build and export our own caps for our satellites in the atmosphere to make them more realistic, but I can't remember the name of this website.

We could build realistic caps and open them like in this picture :

Can someone know which site am I talking about ?

Or maybe it exists now a new mod in KSP to do this.
You're looking for the Fairing Factory by Nathan Fong
You mean fairings? I'm pritty sure that has been entirely replaced by procedual fairings mod, which can make them on the fly in game, without having to download them

sal_vager-> Yes this was exactly this website, thanks !

Sirrobert-> Ok I didn't know it is called fairing in english. So yes, as I expected, it exists a new mod now, I will try this procedural fairings mod, that's sound great !

Thanks

Edited January 29, 2015 by Sanguinax
misspelled
Cap is an interesting term for them, other words have also been used such as shroud
